Description: Black steatite pectoral bearing a relief representation of Amun, Mut, Khons and Thoth; Bes-head at the top pierced for suspension; four columns of Hieroglyphic text on the back(chipped).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
